full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-_CAG-007-29222

**Publication Date:** November 27, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 4, 2024, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Tender Description:**

The Government of Canada invites interested suppliers to submit a proposal for the purchase of used Challenger Jet display units.

**Requirements:**

* Part No.: 622-9978-314 EFD-4077: Electronic Flight Display (Maximum quantity: 13)
* Part No.: 822-0867-010 CDU-6000: Control Display Unit (Maximum quantity: 3)

**Preferential Treatment:**

Units with "repaired/overhauled" status will be given preference over those with "serviceable" status.

**Delivery Date:** As specified in the tender documents

**Tendering Procedure:**

All interested suppliers may submit a bid using the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA) procedures.

**Trade Agreement:**

Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA):**

None

**Nature of Requirements:**

This tender is for the purchase of used display units for use in a Challenger Jet.

**Documents:**

The tender documents, including a detailed scope of work, specifications, and any applicable contracts/certifications, are available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) under the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/12/21/f4bb784d45a4ccf81b8b65e14af517d8/ABES.PROD.PW_CAG.B007.E29222.EBSU003.PDF
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/12/15/61275d63660dc10ae543fc189c8ce3e1/ABES.PROD.PW_CAG.B007.E29222.EBSU002.PDF
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/12/07/71707a97c5cc89ecac2621f11c1ec547/ABES.PROD.PW_CAG.B007.E29222.EBSU001.PDF
* https://canadabuys.can
